article_title: Germany to Hold Talks With Lufthansa Investor Over Bailout: Rtrs
article_text: SHARE THIS ARTICLE   Share   Tweet   Post   Email  {"contentId":"QC9YAIDWLU6I01","position":"brokerboxarticle","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[120,60]],"small_desktop":[[120,60]],"tablet":[[120,60]]},"strategy":"viewable","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"brokerboxarticle1","url":"/news/articles/2020-06-21/germany-to-hold-talks-with-lufthansa-investor-over-bailout-rtrs"},"containerId":"brokerboxarticle-HReelTR"}      A grounded Deutsche Lufthansa AG passenger aircraft in Munich, Germany.  Photographer: Michaela Handrek-Rehle/Bloomberg    Photographer: Michaela Handrek-Rehle/Bloomberg   Lufthansa’s biggest shareholder Heinz Hermann Thiele will meet Germany’s Economy Minister on Monday, to discuss a 9 billion-euro ($10.1 billion) bailout plan for the airline, Reuters reported Sunday, citing an unidentified person familiar with the situation.      #lazy-img-362831295:before{padding-top:66.7%;} Heinz Hermann Thiele Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg   Lufthansa and Germany’s finance ministry declined to comment to Reuters on the meeting and Reuters could not reach Thiele for comment.    {"contentId":"QC9YAIDWLU6I01","position":"outstream","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[1,8]],"small_desktop":[[1,8]],"tablet":[[1,8]]},"strategy":"always","type":"Outstream Video Native Ad","targeting":{"position":"outstream","url":"/news/articles/2020-06-21/germany-to-hold-talks-with-lufthansa-investor-over-bailout-rtrs"},"containerId":"outstream-video-1-QC9YAIDWLU6I01"}   {"contentId":"QC9YAIDWLU6I01","position":"outstream","dimensions":{"mobile":[[1,8]]},"strategy":"always","type":"Outstream Video Native Ad","targeting":{"position":"outstream","url":"/news/articles/2020-06-21/germany-to-hold-talks-with-lufthansa-investor-over-bailout-rtrs"},"containerId":"outstream-video-2-QC9YAIDWLU6I01"}   Thiele has amassed a stake of about 15.5% in the airline, which makes him the biggest shareholder. He has also expressed dissatisfaction with the rescue plan, saying equity investors deserve better terms.    {"contentId":"QC9YAIDWLU6I01","position":"box","dimensions":{"mobile":[[300,250],[3,3],[1,1],"fluid"]},"type":"Mobile Body Box Ad","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"box1","positionIncrement":1,"url":"/news/articles/2020-06-21/germany-to-hold-talks-with-lufthansa-investor-over-bailout-rtrs"},"containerId":"box-BnxJcUA"}   Under the bailout deal, the German government would receive a 20% direct stake in the company and two seats on its supervisory board.
